perturbation.original_text: TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008.
perturbation.changed_text: TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008. Notwithstanding the previous sentence, the Term for all Properties may be terminated earlier at Fox's sole discretion with 30 days written notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text provides a clear expiration date for specific properties. The added sentence gives Fox the unilateral right to terminate the agreement early, even for those specified properties, contradicting the initially stated term and creating uncertainty about the actual duration of the license.

perturbation.original_text: Except as herein expressly amended or by necessary implication modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as herein expressly amended or by necessary implication modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue in full force and effect. However, Fox reserves the right to modify any clause of the Agreement, including those not expressly amended in this document, with written notification.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that the Agreement continues in full force and effect except for explicitly stated amendments. The added sentence allows Fox to unilaterally modify *any* clause of the Agreement, even those previously ratified, creating a contradiction and undermining the entire premise of a mutually agreed-upon contract. This makes the ratified sections uncertain.
